resources.string: Bangladesh University of Business and Technology (BUBT) is a private university in Bangladesh. It was established in 2003. It was established under the UGC approved Private University Act 2003 under the Ministry of Education of Bangladesh. The teaching method of North American University is followed here, which is recognized by the University Grants Commission.The University is established by the Dhaka Commerce College and is governed by a syndicate consisting of members of the Board of Trustees, Principal and Chairman of the Dhaka Commerce College and other members of the Governing Body. Initially, education started in the Commerce College building but now the university is conducting its teaching activities in its own permanent campus Rupnagar A / A.There is also a large playground adjacent to the beribadh to develop students sports thinking, which is located 15-20 minutes away from the campus.
